Accessed on 16 November 2018. | demographics1_title1 = Total | demographics1_info1 = €8.901 billion (2016) | demographics1_title2 = Per capita | demographics1_info2 = €12,889 (2016) | iso_code = SK-ZI | registration_plate = | timezone1 = CET | utc_offset1 = +1 | timezone1_DST = CEST | utc_offset1_DST = +2 | blank_name_sec1 = | blank_info_sec1 = | blank1_name_sec1 = | blank1_info_sec1 = | blank2_name_sec1 = | blank2_info_sec1 = | website = | governing_body = County Council of Žilina Region }} The Žilina Region () is one of the eight regions of Slovakia. The capital is Žilina. The region has 11 districts: Bytča, Čadca, Dolný Kubín, Kysucké Nové Mesto, Liptovský Mikuláš, Martin, Námestovo, Ružomberok, Turčianske Teplice, Tvrdošín and Žilina. There are 315 municipalities in the region. There are largest cities in the region are: Žilina, Martin, Liptovský Mikuláš, Ružomberok, Čadca and Dolný Kubín. == Population == == References == == Other websites == *
title: Žilina Region
